sense.name: learn or improve by repitition
sense.examples: Third-graders should practice their penmenship every day. Let's practice our skit this afternoon. Although I like to perform, I hate to practice.

sense.name: carry out; apply habitually
sense.examples: To practice non-violence in mundane matters is to know its true value. He practiced medicine in Greencastle from 1832 to 1871. Ms. Renault was born in the Jewish faith, but now practices Catholicism.
